title: Virtual Assistant CDI Specialist
description:
Are you a detail-oriented professional with a strong clinical background and expertise in Risk Adjustment Coding and Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI)?



Join our team to ensure the highest level of accuracy, compliance, and quality in our patient documentation and coding practices.



Key Roles & Responsibilities

As a CDI Specialist, you will play a critical role in supporting both our administrative and clinical teams. Your primary responsibilities will fall into two key areas: Documentation Management and Risk Adjustment Education/Optimization.



1. Documentation Integrity & Case Support

Chart Quality Assurance: Review clinical charts to identify documentation gaps, errors, and inconsistencies, ensuring compliance with clinical and administrative standards.



Documentation Resolution: Promptly address and resolve identified documentation issues by collaborating with Case Workers and clinical staff.



Administrative Oversight: Accurately process case-related payments and provide support for clinical supervisor activities.



Workflow Coordination: Coordinate across departments to streamline workflow and maintain alignment on case management tasks.



2. Risk Adjustment & Provider Education

Risk Adjustment Optimization: Perform comprehensive chart reviews to identify documentation opportunities for Risk Adjustment Coding improvement (e.g., HCC capture).



Provider Training: Develop and deliver ongoing training and education to Bluestone providers on accurate documentation and compliance with risk adjustment coding guidelines.



Expert Resource: Serve as the subject matter expert for clinical staff regarding coding inquiries and documentation best practices, offering guidance and feedback.



Compliance Maintenance: Stay current with coding guideline updates and assist in implementing CDI initiatives to optimize coding accuracy and disease burden capture.



Qualifications and Experience

Required:

Certification: Relevant certification in clinical documentation improvement (e.g., CCDS, CDIP) or coding (e.g., CPC, RHIA, RHIT).



Experience: Minimum of [2] years of experience in Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI), medical coding, or a related clinical role.



Risk Adjustment Expertise: Proven knowledge and application of Risk Adjustment Models (e.g., HCC, CDPS) and related coding guidelines.



Clinical Knowledge: Strong understanding of medical terminology, pathophysiology, and clinical documentation requirements.



Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to provide effective education and feedback to providers and clinical staff.



Remote Work: Demonstrated success and experience working effectively in a remote work environment from 8:00 - 5:00 PM CST.



Preferred:

Experience with electronic health record (EHR) systems specific to our organization.

Background in Quality Improvement or Compliance Auditing.

title: We're Hiring: Bookkeeper (Real Estate)
description:
Do you have a sharp eye for detail and a passion for keeping numbers balanced? We’re looking for a Bookkeeper who thrives in a fast-paced, growth-driven environment and wants to be a part of a team that’s transforming real estate through innovation. 



This is your chance to join a goal-oriented and supportive team where accuracy, organization, and accountability make all the difference.  



If you’re looking for perks and other payoffs: 



1. Healthcare Package 

2. Annual Performance-Based Pay Increase 

3. Flexible Paid Leave – we trust you to balance focus and rest 



And you have what it takes to be successful: 



1. Strong organizational, verbal and written communication skills (Your “clients” include both Skymount and out stakeholders) 

2. Solid experience in bookkeeping or accounting, preferably with general real estate bookkeeping exposure 

3. QuickBooks Certification (required) and strong working knowledge of QuickBooks, Excel, and accounting systems 

4. Familiarity with classes and projects in QuickBooks (huge plus) 

5. Self-discipline, excellent time management, and resilience under deadlines 

6. A strong problem-solving-mindset, because you won’t just enter numbers, you’ll help identify financial issues, propose solutions, and work alongside leadership to keep projects on track 

7. Ability to work at least 6 hours per day on the night shift. 

8. Confidence in working independently while communicating clearly and collaborating with the team when needed. 



Then you can easily ace these duties and responsibilities:  



1. Recording daily financial transactions with accuracy 

2. Maintaining and reconciling accounts, ledgers, and bank statements 

3. Preparing invoices, track payments, and manage accounts payable/receivable 

4. Generating financial reports to support decision-making 

5. Collaborating with the team to ensure compliance and smooth operations 

6. Keeping clean, well-organized financial records 

7. Supporting audits and tax preparation when needed 



But wait, there’s more! (Not something you have to ace, to be honest) 



>Desktop/Laptop (i5 or Ryzen 5+, 8GB RAM minimum) 

>Dual monitors for multitasking 

>Windows 10 or newer 

>Stable internet connection (75+MBPS + backup connection) 

>Noise cancelling headset 

>Quiet, dedicated home office 



If you think you’re the one we’re describing here, then don’t just stare at your screen and grab this opportunity to be one of us! 



TO APPLY: 



Respond to this post 



Use Vocaroo to answer the following questions. Attach the link of your recording (NOT MORE THAN 5 MINS.) to your response or
. 



1. Imagine a client’s account doesn’t reconcile at the end of the month. Walk us through how you would approach fixing it. 

2. If you notice a financial or inconsistency issue that could impact leadership decisions, how do you communicate it? 

3. Do you prefer working independently or collaborating closely with a team? Why? 



Send us a copy of your latest resume for our reference. 



WE’RE LOOKING FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU! 



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

WHO IS SKYMOUNT? I’ll give you a better one, WHY SKYMOUNT? 

 

At Skymount, our culture is more than buzzwords—it's grounded in deeply rooted values that shape every decision we make and every relationship we build. We believe in People First, always putting empathy, humility, and humanity above ego. Whether it's a teammate, a client, or a seller, we treat everyone with dignity and lead them with kindness. We live by a Growth Mindset, both our business planning and our daily showing up— challenging ourselves to learn, evolve, and become better versions of ourselves, both as individuals and as professionals. Radical Transparency is part of our DNA; we believe in open and honest communication to build trust, even when the discussions are difficult. And on the hard days (because they inevitably do exist), we dig in and tap into our Grit—refusing to give up, regardless of the obstacle in our way. These aren’t platitudes on a wall; these are the standard we hold ourselves to and the energy we bring to all we do. We don’t just work at Skymount—we live out our values together.

title: Senior Experienced Project Manager & Call Handler (Property Maintenance & Renovations) – Remote Role
description:
Hello,



PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE APPLYING 



We take great pride in our thorough and rigorous recruitment process. Please do NOT apply unless you have substantial experience working remotely in property maintenance and improvement – including handyman services, renovations, plumbing, and painting.



This is a fully remote position, and we are specifically looking for candidates who have previously worked remotely in this field.



We are not a property management company; we specialise in property maintenance. If you're unsure about the difference between the two, this role may not be the right fit for you. We need someone with extensive experience in maintenance, repairs, and refurbishments who understands the technical aspects of keeping properties in top condition and can effectively coordinate work from a remote setting.



Do you fit the role?

-Are you a highly experienced and skilled Project Manager (Maintenance Coordinator) with a passion for property maintenance and improvement?

- Do you have at least five years of remote work experience in this sector?

-Can you confidently handle client PHONE CALLS and manage communication professionally?

- Do you excel in time management, organisation, and remote team coordination?



If so, this could be a fantastic opportunity for you!



About Us

We are a well-respected property maintenance and improvement company based in London, UK. We focus on delivering high-quality services and take pride in our professionalism, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction.



Position Overview

We are looking for a Project Manager with at least five years of full-time remote experience in the property maintenance and improvement sector (covering renovations, plumbing, electrical, and handyman jobs). The ideal candidate will have a STRONG background in construction and renovation, with a very deep understanding of property maintenance challenges and solutions.



This role requires exceptional attention to detail, strong communication skills, and the ability to manage tasks efficiently from a remote setting.



Essential Requirements



1. Remote Experience

Minimum 5 years of experience in property maintenance and improvement, working remotely with construction or renovation companies. [PLEASE NOTE YOU MUST HAVE WORKED REMOTELY, WORKING FOR THE LOCAL MARKET IS NOT SUFFICIENT. ]

Experience in managing remote teams and coordinating jobs without being on-site.



2. Language & Communication

Fluent in spoken and written English, with a clear, neutral accent.



3. Job Management Systems & CRM

Proficiency in job management systems such as ServiceM8, 
, or similar.



4. Time Management & Administration

Ability to handle multiple tasks efficiently in a remote setting.



5. Telephone Skills

Exceptional phone skills for handling client inquiries, scheduling, and team coordination.



6. Initiative & Self-Motivation

Proactive and self-driven – someone who takes the initiative and continuously seeks process improvements.



7. Responsiveness & Urgency

Quick to respond to
s and phone calls, handling matters with a sense of urgency.

Comfortable with voice and video calls when required.



8. Quoting & Invoicing

Ability to prepare accurate quotes and invoices independently.



9. Note-Taking & Follow-Up

Excellent record-keeping – maintaining detailed notes on jobs, timesheets, and meetings, and ensuring timely follow-ups with customers and staff.



10. Staff Management

Experience in coordinating and managing field staff remotely.



11. Working Hours

8:00 AM – 5:30 PM GMT (UK Time) – you must be available during UK working hours.



Why Join Us?

-Work remotely with a reputable UK-based company.

- Join a passionate and professional team.

- Use your expertise to make a real impact.

- Be part of a company that values excellence, attention to detail, and high standards.



How to Apply

Please ONLY apply if you meet all the above requirements and have extensive experience in remote property maintenance coordination.



To apply:

1) Send your updated CV.

2) AT THE SAME TIME Record a short video (via Loom or Google Drive) explaining:



-Your relevant remote work experience.

-Why you are a great fit for this role. And how you can handle phone calls to make sales.





This ensures that only serious applicants who have read the job description carefully are considered.



Applications without a video will not be reviewed.





Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.





In summary 





This role requires strong sales abilities and the confidence to engage with new clients over the phone. You must have a proven track record in selling property maintenance services to new customers on the phone, as this is not an easy job. 



Fluency in UK English is essential—you must be able to communicate clearly, understand client needs, and convince potential customers to use our services. While training will be provided, this role is not suitable for those who have never sold to brand-new customers or lack experience in converting inquiries into bookings. 



In summary, we need someone who can handle calls exceptionally well, build trust with clients, and demonstrate strong technical knowledge of the property maintenance sector to guide them effectively.



We look forward to welcoming an exceptional remote Project Manager / Maintenance Coordinator to our team!
salary: Salary based on experience and sales ...

title: Shopify Replo Developer (Figma to Live Implementation)
description:
We are looking for a technical Replo Developer to implement our Figma designs into Shopify.



We are a DTC e-commerce company launching multiple brands in different niches. We provide completed, high-end designs in Figma. Your role is to build these designs pixel-perfectly into Shopify using Replo.



This is strictly a development/implementation role. No design work required.





JOB DETAILS:



Rate: $10/hour

Hours per week: To be discussed

Type: Long-term, multiple projects (Homepages, Product Pages, Collection Pages, Landing Pages)





RESPONSIBILITIES:



Translate Figma designs into functional, high-speed Shopify pages using Replo.

Ensure 100% visual accuracy between the Figma design and the live site (Desktop & Mobile).

Create reusable sections and templates within Replo using Shopify Metafields/Dynamic Data.

Optimize pages for loading speed and structure.





REQUIREMENTS:



Replo Expertise: Must have extensive experience building custom layouts from scratch in Replo (not just templates).

Figma Proficiency: Ability to inspect files for exact dimensions, colors, and typography.

Shopify Technical Knowledge: Understanding of liquid logic is a plus, but mastery of Replo is essential.

Attention to Detail: Must double-check mobile responsiveness before delivery.





TO APPLY:



Please answer the screening questions below. Include "REPLO-DEV" in your subject line to confirm you have read the requirements and answer below questions:



1. Please share 2-3 links to live Shopify pages you have personally built using Replo.

2. Do you build pages manually in Replo to ensure clean code, or do you use auto-import plugins? (We require manual builds).

3. Are you available for long-term work on multiple brands?

title: Marketing VA
description:
Part-Time to Full-Time | 10-40 hours/week



I am seeking a detail-oriented Virtual Marketing Assistant with strong experience in AI tools (ChatGPT, Canva AI, HeyGen), Google Ads, Meta Ads, Brivity, and social media management, and Amazon print on demand product creation.. This role supports a fast growing real estate business by executing marketing tasks, optimizing digital ads, and maintaining consistent online presence across multiple platforms. The ideal candidate is self-directed, creative, collaborative, and fast with tech — someone who can take strategy and turn it into polished, on-brand deliverables without micromanagement.



Key Responsibilities

1. Real Estate Marketing Support

Create, schedule, and manage Brivity SmartPlans, drip campaigns, and automations

Maintain listing marketing tasks in Brivity and update client communications

Responsible for property marketing (listing descriptions, Canva graphics, flyers, social posts, ads, etc.)

Prepare and send weekly seller updates using templates





2. Social Media Management

Schedule, post, and monitor content across:


, Instagram, TikTok*, YouTube*, LinkedIn*, Google Business Profile, Local Services Ads

Repurpose long-form content into short-form and platform-native versions with a heavy reliance on AI

Create and schedule all social media across all platforms

Track engagement metrics and identify opportunities to boost visibility





3. Digital Advertising (Google + Meta Ads)

Set up, manage, and optimize Google Search, Display, and Performance Max campaigns

Manage Meta Ads Manager for listing ads, lead generation, and retargeting

Track KPIs, analyze performance, and report weekly on results

Ensure all ads are Fair Housing compliant and consistent with brand





4. AI-Driven Content Creation

Tools include: ChatGPT, HeyGen, Canva Magic Write, other AI tools as needed

Responsibilities:

Draft social captions, blogs,
 campaigns, newsletters

Convert blogs into video scripts for HeyGen and use AI prompts to repurpose long-form content

Create property marketing materials and social content

Maintain consistency in my voice, tone, branding, and compliance

Update and/or Build SOPs and templates for repeatable workflows





5. Video Editing & Distribution

Use HeyGen to create avatar videos for updates, listings, and educational content

Add captions, branding, and correct formatting for Reels/Shorts/TikTok

Upload videos with optimized titles, descriptions, and SEO-friendly tags

Create vertical and horizontal formats as needed





6. Administrative & Operational Support

Maintain Google Drive organization for files, photos, and marketing assets

Track tasks, deadlines, and marketing calendars

Monitor CRM activity and notify me of hot/warm leads

Help build systems, automations, and checklists for efficiency

Prepare weekly marketing reports summarizing activity and insights







Ideal Qualifications

Experience as a VA in real estate or digital marketing

Strong understanding of Google Ads and Meta Ads Manager

Skilled with Brivity (or similar real estate CRM)

Advanced proficiency with ChatGPT, Canva, and HeyGen and other AI tools

Strong English communication skills

Ability to overlap at least 6-8 hours with U.S. business hours

Organized, tech-forward, and able to handle fast turnaround projects





Soft Skills

Creative yet detail-oriented

Strong problem-solving abilities with a solutions-first mindset

Collaborative, open to feedback, and able to work closely with me

Fast learner with strong tech intuition

Independent worker with excellent communication

Highly organized and reliable

Comfortable adapting to new tools and systems





Performance Expectations

Consistent multi-platform posting

High-quality marketing deliverables

Strong ad performance and decreasing cost-per-lead

Clear and proactive communication

Daily reporting on tasks and challenges

Weekly reporting on marketing with insights, not just screenshots
